student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Discussing favourite foods with 'enjoy + ing', using, for example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy eating pizza with lots of cheese. How about you? What foods do you enjoy eating?
I enjoy eating pasta with tomato sauce. What about you? Do you enjoys trying new foods?
Yes, I enjoy trying new foods! I especially enjoy tasting dishes from different countries. Do you enjoy cooking, or do you prefer going to restaurants?
conversation.advanced_content: Yes, I enjoy trying new foods! I especially enjoy tasting dishes from different countries. Do you enjoy cooking, or do you prefer eating out?

conversation.content: I enjoy cooking at home, but I also enjoys going to restaurants sometimes. What about you? Do you enjoy cooking too?
Yes, I enjoy cooking too! I enjoy making simple meals like soups and salads. What about you? What do you enjoy cooking the most?
I enjoy making pasta dishes the most. I like trying different sauces. Do you enjoys baking desserts?

Yes, I enjoy baking desserts! I especially enjoy making cookies and cakes. It’s been great talking about food with you. Keep practicing using “enjoy + -ing” in your sentences—you’re doing great! Good luck with your English studies! 😊
Thank you! I enjoys practicing English with you. I will keep trying to use "enjoy + -ing" in my sentences. Have a nice day! 😊
Great job! I enjoy practicing with you. Keep practicing, and talk to you later! Have a wonderful day! 😊
conversation.advanced_content: Great job! I enjoyed practicing with you. Keep up the good work, and talk to you later! Have a wonderful day! 😊
